Footer.arweaveNetSite: Waxaa la dhex jirtaa arweave.net seef

TimelineContent.heroTitle: Waxaan ahay iska loodge England oo hadda ku dhex socdaa US/UK/EU iyadoo isticmaalaya AirBnb's. Waxaan xiisaysan yahay crypto, startups iyo software development. Waxaan leeyahay background oo ku salaysay venture capital iyo acting.
TimelineContent.timeline2025Title: Fulay sii daynay LiquidOps mainnet & diiradda saarney hormarinta
TimelineContent.timeline2025Description: Sanadkan waxaan wakhti badan isticmaalay fulaynta [LiquidOps' mainnet](https://x.com/Liquid_Ops/status/1905268807746060790?s=20). Mid ka mid ah aragtida ugu qiimeesan ee aan bartay sanadkan waxeey tahay in startups-yada aysan ku saabsan alaabta keliya. Hormarinta iyo marketing waxay lagu mikro filan yihiin (haddii kale aysan ka weyn) alaabta, sidaa darteed waxaan bilaabay [abuurista qaab-dhismeed](/projects#content-creator) iyo diiradda saarnida hormarinta.
TimelineContent.timeline2024Description: Waxaan soo dhaaftay fikrada [LiquidOps](/projects#liquidops) iyadoo leh [Marton Lederer](https://x.com/martonlederer) sannadkan oo ka dib socod ciiran oo ambisiyoos oo qaylin Cambridge halkaas oo waxaan ku nool ahaa. [AO](https://ao.arweave.net) wuxuu ahaa hore iyo si dhakhso ah ayaan ogadnay awooda si looga faideeystay hadda jira ee dalabiga xarumaha. Waxyaabaha kale waxaan shaqeeyey sida Engineering Partner ee [AO Ventures](https://aoventures.io). Waxaan gacan siiyay teams-ka kulan-ka iyo waxaan gaaban sidii ay u soo shaaciyaan demo day oo dhinaca tech ah, waxaan dhamaystir ay kaas-oo-dhamaystir u soo shaacisay guud ahaan fikrad cusub - [LiquidOps](/projects#liquidops).
TimelineContent.timeline2023Description: Waxaan noqday first external Fellow [Community Labs](https://communitylabs.com) hadii dib-u-socda seed round. Waxaan soo celiyay [Wallety](/projects#wallety) grant si aan si buuxda uga diirado [Arweave](https://arweave.org) ecosystem. Intii aan ku jiray halkaa ayaan dhisay [Othent](/projects#othent), Oases iyo [Subsidise.js](/projects#subsidisejs).
TimelineContent.timeline2022Title: Waxaan soo qaadey Community Labs & waxaan nafsigaygay barootidaye si looga codo
TimelineContent.timeline2022Description: Markii aan ogaadey in mamuulka laga ma raxraaxin sida dhisista, waxaan u magacaabay ujeeddo ah in baroo kalimada lagu bartay mar danbe. Waxaan si dhakhso leh baro oo kalimada ku dhisay mashruuca ugu horreeyay [Wallety](/projects#wallety). Waxay ahayd dhamaantig laakin raaxo weyn. Kadibna waxaan helay jawaab [Tate Berenbaum](https://x.com/TateBerenbaum) oo noqday saaxiib dhow oo waxaan go'aansaday inaan ku biiro [Community Labs](https://communitylabs.com) sidii qofka ugu horreeyay ee dibadda.
TimelineContent.timeline2021Title: Waxaan xad-dhaafay Crypto VC ka inta yar ee bedroom-kayga
TimelineContent.timeline2021Description: Waxaan qaatay internship-oo aan la bixin ah oo ku taal crypto venture capital fund oo ka dib markii aan sanad hore cold email. Waxaan shaqeeyey 3 bilood oon la bixin kara waxay igu soo bandhigeen shaqo-lagu-bixiyo, markaa waxaan shaqeeyey venture iyo hedge funds-ooda inta xil-inta sanad ee xiga. Waxaan qataar waqtigaygii waxaan samayay mainly due diligence on dealflow, qabiilka boggii laba-jiile ee investment commitee iyo weliba ay kulan yihiin with founders ee raba inay sheegtaan firms. Intii xilkaas ayaan weliba kaas oo volunteer ahaan [Polkadot Ambassador](https://polkadot.com/community/ambassador-program) halkaas oo waxaan gacan siiyay dhiska dalabiga iyo waxaan qabay IRL London picnic halka oo intii badan 100 qof ayaa yimid oo ay jiraan ecosystem teams iyo founders.
TimelineContent.timeline2020Title: Crypto Teen & waxaan ka baxay drama school
TimelineContent.timeline2020Description: Intii aan ku jiray drama school ee [Emil Dale Academy](https://www.emildale.co.uk), waxaan bilaabay Crypto TikTok educational channel oo ay maqsadoshedu ahayd in lagu baro Gen Z crypto. Si aan uga xammaaso industry waxaan cold email 500 iska badan companies, investment firms iyo projects hadii ay iga qaadaan oo shaqo aan la bixin ah. Inta badan 500 emails laga dib qiyaaso 6 ayay walaac. Waxaan jiray mararka ah leh Zoom meetings balcoon-ka school leh phone classmates-kaygaa oon lahayn data intii loo dhaafay classes si aan sheegtaan VCs iyo businesses hadii ay gacan siiso hired me. Waxayna ahayd really surreal waqti nolol-kaygaa oo waxay halka jooga hadii intaa ka badh. Xilkaas-na ayaa weliba waxaan fundraise buugga Drama School in ay iskaydh dhaqan qofka balaadhan resale ee eBay-ga si aan bixi ugo bixi jaamac bills ka dib markii aan qaatay inspiration Gary Vee, waxay shaqaysay!
TimelineContent.timeline2019Description: Waxaan soo qaadey Ethereum community 2019 ka dib markii aan baro smart contracts.
TimelineContent.timeline2017Description: Intii laakiin maalmaha labadedu dhamayn dhex yimid caadi ay rayshanayeen gacmaha, waxaan ahaa ayaa fix phone screens cash.
TimelineContent.photo2025_8: Waxaan joogay SF hadii markii hore
TimelineContent.photo2021_1: Hosting iyadoo leh Kadar iyo Clifton
TimelineContent.photo2020_1: Reselling dhagaha si ay bixi college
TimelineContent.photo2020_5: IG bot ayaa bilaabay in ay shaqaysay
TimelineContent.timeline2026Description: Sannadkan LiquidOps waxay qaatay [Astro](https://www.astrousd.com/), oo lagu aasaasay saaxiibkay caank ah [Kadar Sayed Abdi](https://x.com/0xKadar).
TimelineContent.photo2026_3: Visa O1 Mareykanka ee uu leeyahay ayaa la oggolaaday!

AngelPage.title: Malicadda Lagu Tumiyo
introAndElevator: Waxaan jeclan yahay in ay kulan founders kale oo dhisaya wax ay dhaarta u fiicaan. Marka ay arko awooda iyo dadka wax ayaan gacan siyin karaa bedda oo kaliya oo capital, waxaan xiisaysan yahay inaan ka soo qaado hadii hore.

Tipically waxaan barwaaqo seegee **$500 iyo $5,000** ee pre-seed iyo really hadii hore seed rounds. In kasta oo aan barwaaqo seegee picanaha, waxaan isku daba joog inaan ahaado useful. Sida ay yihiin isku xiriirka, alaab feedback, tech iyo noteca, ama kaliya noqon qofka inaad yara sheekaha la hadlad, iska akhriso dheeraad ca qoraalka hoos.

Muujinay, waxaan hadda full-time founder iyo plan ah inaan ahaa mid hadda markii dhow, sidaa darteed maay karayn si ay aad qanac siiso full-time portfolio companies. Tipically kaliyah iska tumiyo companies oo dhisaya similar environments ku yaala hadda ama waxaan dhisay dhamaadkii, sidaa darteed kaliyah gacan siyo direct problem-solving. Fadlan iska akhriso dheeraad ca [angel investing disclosures](/disclosures).
AngelPage.helpTitle: Notable Things I Have Done That Could Help You
helpItems: Maay karayn inaan aad noo jeedin legal/accounting issues, laakiin ay karayn inaan kudin foolka sida looga dhamaystiro lawyers, accountants, iyo professionals (iyo isku daba joog inaan hubo aad aysan scam ka gacmaha high fees). Hadda iska dib waxaan aasaasay 4 limited companies ee UK iyo 1 Delaware C corporation.
Barashada inta jeclahay ahaan fullstack developer oo internet-ka
Managay xoolo yar oo lightweight oo teams ay karayn quickly execute
Successfully closed multiple fundraising rounds oo VCs, accelerators, grant foundations, iyo decentralised blockchain treasuries
Shaqeeyay startups/VCs/corporates iyo held pretty much every role, oo ay jiraan CEO, engineer, analyst, COO responsibilities iyo been private software contractor
Sida ay faham karaan website-kaygaa, waxaan ahaa SCRAPPY. Awa superpower ayaan iska leeyahay iyo mid hope ah ay karayn inaan gacan siyo develop/nurture.
Launched waitlist oo ay jirtaa thousands signups iyo grew ilaa $55m soft commits
Built/designed/launched numerous products startup iyo corporate environments
Made pitch decks, pitches, iyo business plans successfully iyo unsuccessfully
AngelPage.pressureTitle: I Take On Problems Under Pressure and Solve Them
pressureItems: Fixed 2 major black swan events live mainnet DeFi protocol
Spoken front live/online audiences iyo both succeeded iyo TOTALLY fluffed speeches
Purchased IP, sold IP, iyo acquired companies
Built teams iyo both hired iyo fired team members
Worked accountants, lawyers, freelancers, iyo marketing firms
Cold emailed companies/people successfully (hadda u jab warm intros)
Had ahaan creative solving delicate problems, usually leh numerous sensitive verticals
Had ahaan 1-1 negative feedback iyo received many times
Stood up iyo squashed workplace iyo kale founder bullies
Worked good company cultures, worked bad ones, built good ones, iyo fixed kale company's culture numerous times
Previous nolol waxaan ahaa actor. Can help aad yeeldho human social media content iyo demo day pitches
Had successful VC pitches iyo really really bad ones
Judged iyo participated hackathons (still not won one yet, loser)
Bilaha design products iyo how to use tools sida Figma iyo Webflow
AngelPage.mistakesTitle: Major Mistakes I Have Made That I Don't Want You To
mistakesItems: Spent over $50k USD funding round's legal fees ay dhakhso been $5k
Spent year building product iyo not fully focused growth iyo marketing
Triggered tax bill ay wiped all life savings iyo personally -$26k net worth iyo debt overnight
Absolutely demolished credit score iyo personal finances founder, markaa rebuilt
Forgotten value dollar iyo how far ay go
Lost literally thousands dollars fees careless mistakes using incorrect software
Developed iyo lost having personal ego
AngelPage.ctaText: Waxaan jeclan yahay in ay buugga.
AngelPage.astroDescription: Astro ayaa simplified blockchain liquidity management as stablecoin issuer.
AngelPage.velaventuresDescription: Web3 venture studio behind apps sida [Beacon](https://getbeaconapp.com), [Vento](https://ventoswap.com/?tab=swap) iyo [AO Sync](https://github.com/vela-ventures/ao-sync-sdk).
AngelPage.upshotDescription: Adduunka hore high-stakes prediction card platform, built Base ecosystem.
AngelPage.saySoDescription: Suuq tilmaamis Web3 oo lagu dhisay nidaamka blockchain-ka Sei.
AngelPage.plasmaOrbitalDescription: Kampani valmistay shabakada micro satelliit ah oo lagu isticmaalo ilaalinta badda.

content.content: Boggan waxaa ku jirta muujiyaaha muhiim ah oo ku saabsan activities-kaygaa angel investing. Fadlan akhriso aqoonta si saxda ah ka hor intaad isku xidhiidh hadii ay jiraan investment opportunities.
Personal Capital Only

Waxaan tumiyo personal money-kaygaa. Anis **not** venture capital fund, anis do **not** manage fund, iyo anis do **not** accept capital oo limited partners (LPs) ama kale external investors. All investment decisions ay ay lagu galo solely me using personal funds-kaygaa.
Not Investment Advice

Waxaa oo bogga not ay ahaan lagu tilmaamo as investment, legal, accounting, tax, ama life advice. Anis **not** authorized ama regulated Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) ama kale financial regulatory body. Any investment decisions ay aad samaynto ay ay ahaato responsibility-kaaga.
No Fiduciary Duty
Anis aw owe any fiduciary duty founders ama companies ay tumiyo liiga ka badan sida ay set out sa relevant investment documentation. Anis investor, not advisor, director, ama fiduciary.
Not a Solicitation

Waxaa oo bogga not ay constitute solicitation, offer, ama recommendation to invest in any company, security, ama investment product. Any information about portfolio-kaygaa companies ay for informational purposes only.
No Guarantee of Investment
Isku xidhiidh ama send pitch does **not** guarantee ay tumiyo. Waxaan review opportunities selectively iyo invest in very few companies each year (maximum 1-2).
Limited Availability

Anis currently full-time founder iyo plan ahaan mid hadda markii dhow, sidaa darteed maay karayn si ay qanac siiso full-time portfolio companies. Waxaan usually kaliyah tumiyo companies oo dhisaya similar environments ku yaala hadda ama waxaan dhisay dhamaadkii, sidaa darteed kaliyah gacan siyo direct problem-solving.
No Advisory Relationships

Anis do advise companies ama founders. Waxaan acu maqal advisors ay misaligned (unless para really late-stage companies) ‚Äî [watch Steve Jobs explain why](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-c4CNB80SRc). Waxaan kaliyah angel invest founders iyo ideas ay tumiyo iyo think ay gacan siyo build.
Early Stage Focus

Anis probably not ay ahaan helpful later-stage founders. Anis early stage myself iyo can best help people sa earliest stages (before Series A). But if ay are late-stage founder iyo think ay karayn helpful, anis still interested.
Tax Considerations
Any tax reliefs mentioned (sida SEIS ama EIS) ay subject individual circumstances iyo HMRC rules. Aad ay seek independent tax advice. Anis make no representations about tax status any investment.
Confidentiality

If aad share confidential information me, anis ay treat leh reasonable care, laakiin maay guarantee absolute confidentiality. Anis ay ahaan exposed similar ideas oo kale founders. Do not share information aad aysan comfortable disclosing. Unless anis ay sign separate written confidentiality agreement aad, anis aw owe obligation to treat information aad send me as confidential.
Conflicts of Interest

Anis ay karayn invest companies ay compete each other ama leh companies aad dhisaya. Anis ay not obligation to disclose kale investments aad, iyo anis ay not obligation to refrain investing competing companies.
Risk Warning

**Angel investing early-stage companies ay involve high degree risk.** Aad ay karayn lose entire investment. Past performance ay not indicative future results. The value investments ay karayn go down as well as up. Early-stage investments ay illiquid iyo aad ay karayn not sell shares para many years, if ever.

content.title: UK Investor Status
content.content: Anis **Self-Certified Sophisticated Investor** oo lagu tixgeliso Financial Services iyo Markets Act 2000 (Financial Promotion) Order 2005. Anis qualify basis having worked professional capacity provision finance small iyo medium enterprises within past two years (as contractor para blockchain accelerator programs involving early-stage investment).
content.note: **Para Founders:** By sharing investment materials me, aad confirm ay conducted appropriate checks under UK Financial Promotions regime iyo reasonably believe anis eligible to receive such communications. If aad bilahan sign self-certification form before sharing pitch, anis happy to do so.

content.content: If aad ay questions about disclosures, please contact me at hellolorimerjenkins@gmail.com.
Agreement to Terms
By accessing iyo using lorimerjenkins.com ("Site"), aad agree ahaan bound these Terms of Service ("Terms"). If aad do not agree these Terms, please do not use Site.
Description of Service
Lorimerjenkins.com ay personal website owned iyo operated Lorimer Jenkins. Site ay provide information about work-kaygaa, projects, angel investing activities, iyo kale content anis choose to share.
Use of Site
Acceptable Use
Aad agree ahaan use Site only para lawful purposes iyo way does not infringe upon rights oo kale ama restrict their use Site. Prohibited activities include, laakiin not limited to:

items: Attempting to gain unauthorized access Site ama systems-ka
Transmitting viruses, malware, ama kale harmful code
Using automated systems (bots, scrapers) without permission
Violating any applicable laws ama regulations

content.content: Access to Site
Anis reserve right to modify, suspend, ama discontinue Site at any time without notice, restrict access to certain parts Site, iyo block users ay violate these Terms.
Angel Investing Information

Angel investing section bogga ay for informational purposes only. Waxaa oo bogga not ay constitute investment advice, offer to buy ama sell securities, ama financial, legal, tax, ama accounting advice. Anis not authorized ama regulated Financial Conduct Authority (FCA). Please see [angel investing disclosures](/disclosures) para full details.
Intellectual Property

Unless otherwise noted, all content bogga, including laakiin not limited to text, images, graphics, logos, videos, iyo code, ay property Lorimer Jenkins iyo ay protected copyright, trademark, iyo kale intellectual property laws.

Aad ay granted limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable license to access iyo use Site para personal, non-commercial purposes. Aad ay not karayn reproduce, distribute, ama republish Site content without permission, modify ama create derivative works, use Site content para commercial purposes, ama remove copyright ama proprietary notices oo content.
Submissions and Communications

If aad submit pitch materials, business plans, ama kale information me regarding potential investment opportunities: aad retain ownership materials-kaaga, aad grant me non-exclusive license to review iyo analyse materials-kaaga, anis ay under no obligation to review materials-kaaga ama invest, anis ay karayn receive similar ideas oo kale sources, iyo aad ay responsible para protecting confidential information-kaaga.
External Links

Site ay karayn contain links to third-party websites ama resources. Links ay for convenience only. Anis ay not responsible para content, accuracy, ama practices oo external sites, any damages resulting oo use kale sites, ama availability oo external sites.
Disclaimer of Warranties

**SITE AY PROVIDED ON "AS IS" IYO "AS AVAILABLE" BASIS WITHOUT WARRANTIES AY ANY KIND**, either express ama implied, including laakiin not limited to warranties oo merchantability, fitness para particular purpose, ay Site ay karayn ahaan uninterrupted, secure, ama error-free, ama regarding accuracy, reliability, ama completeness oo content.
Limitation of Liability

**TO FULLEST EXTENT PERMITTED LAW, LORIMER JENKINS SHALL NOT BE LIABLE PARA ANY** indirect, incidental, special, consequential, ama punitive damages, loss oo profits, revenue, data, ama use, damages arising oo use Site, investment losses, ama damages oo reliance any information bogga.

Limitation ay applies regardless legal theory iyo even if anis ay been advised oo possibility such damages. **In no event shall liability-kaygaa exceed amount aad bixisay to access Site (which ay zero).**
Indemnification

Aad agree ahaan indemnify, defend, iyo hold harmless Lorimer Jenkins oo any claims, damages, losses, liabilities, iyo expenses arising oo use Site, violation-kaaga oo these Terms, violation-kaaga oo any rights another party, any investment decisions aad make, ama any materials aad submit.
Privacy
Use-kaaga oo Site ay also governed [Privacy Policy](/privacy), which ay incorporated into these Terms by reference.
Changes to Terms

Anis reserve right to modify these Terms at any time. Changes ay effective immediately upon posting leh updated "Last Updated" date. Continued use-kaaga oo Site after changes ay constitute acceptance oo modified Terms.
Governing Law

Terms ay ay governed by iyo construed accordance laws oo England iyo Wales. Any disputes ay resolved through good faith negotiation, iyo if ay fails, courts oo England iyo Wales ay have exclusive jurisdiction.
Severability
If any provision oo these Terms ay found ahaan invalid ama unenforceable, remaining provisions ay continue full force iyo effect.
Contact
If aad ay questions about these Terms, please contact me at hellolorimerjenkins@gmail.com.
By using Site, aad acknowledge ay aad read, understood, iyo agree ahaan bound these Terms of Service.
Introduction
Welcome lorimerjenkins.com ("Site"). Privacy Policy ay explains how Lorimer Jenkins ("I," "me," ama "my") collects, uses, iyo protects information when aad visit personal website.
Information I Collect
Automatically Collected Information
When aad visit Site, anis automatically collect certain information through Google Analytics, including:

items: Pages aad visit iyo time spent each page

content.content: Information You Provide
Currently, Site does not collect personal information directly oo users through forms ama accounts, leh following exception:

**Angel Investing Enquiries:** If aad contact me regarding angel investment opportunities via email, anis ay karayn receive iyo store information aad choose to provide, including name-kaaga, email address, company information, pitch materials, iyo any kale information contained correspondence-kaaga.
How I Use Your Information
Anis use information collected through Google Analytics to understand how visitors use Site, improve content iyo user experience, analyse traffic patterns, iyo monitor Site performance.
Anis use information provided via angel investing enquiries to evaluate potential investment opportunities, communicate leh founders, iyo maintain records oo investment-related correspondence.
Google Analytics

Site ay use Google Analytics, web analytics service provided Google LLC. Google Analytics ay use cookies to help analyse how users interact leh Site. Para more information about how Google use data, please visit: [Google's Privacy Policy](https://policies.google.com/technologies/partner-sites)
Opting Out

Aad ay karayn opt out oo Google Analytics by installing [Google Analytics Opt-out Browser Add-on](https://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout) ama adjusting browser settings-kaaga to block ama delete cookies.
Cookies

Cookies ay small text files stored on device-kaaga. Site ay use cookies only through Google Analytics para purposes described above. Aad ay karayn control cookie preferences through browser settings-kaaga.
Data Retention

Google Analytics data ay retained para 26 months oo collection, after which ay automatically deleted. Information provided via angel investing enquiries ay retained para as long as reasonably necessary ama as required law.
Angel Investing Communications
If aad send pitch materials ama kale investment-related information:

items: Anis ay karayn treat information-kaaga leh reasonable care
Anis ay karayn share information leh professional advisors under confidentiality obligations where necessary
Anis ay not karayn guarantee absolute confidentiality
Anis ay do not sell ama share information-kaaga leh third parties para marketing purposes
Aad ay not karayn send information aad aysan comfortable disclosing

content.content: Third-Party Links
Site ay karayn contain links to third-party websites. Anis ay not responsible para privacy practices oo external sites. Anis encourage aad ahaan review privacy policies-ka.
Your Rights

Depending location-kaaga, aad ay karayn ay certain rights regarding data-kaaga, including right to access information anis hold about aad, request deletion oo data-kaaga, object ahaan processing, iyo data portability. To exercise rights, please contact me at hellolorimerjenkins@gmail.com.
For EU Visitors (GDPR)

If aad ay located European Union, aad ay additional rights under General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). Legal basis para processing data-kaaga ay legitimate interest improving iyo analysing Site, iyo para angel investing communications, legitimate interest evaluating potential investment opportunities.
For California Visitors (CCPA)
If aad ay California resident, aad ay rights under California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA), including right ahaan know what personal information ay collected iyo right ahaan request deletion.
Children's Privacy

Site ay not directed children under age 18. Anis ay do not knowingly collect personal information oo children under 18. If aad believe anis ay inadvertently collected such information, please contact me to have removed.
Changes to This Policy
Anis ay karayn update Privacy Policy oo time to time. Any changes ay posted bogga leh updated "Last Updated" date.
Security
While anis strive ahaan protect information-kaaga, no method oo transmission over internet ay 100% secure. Anis ay not karayn guarantee absolute security oo data transmitted ahaan ama stored Site.
Contact
If aad ay questions about Privacy Policy, please contact me at hellolorimerjenkins@gmail.com.
By using Site, aad consent ahaan collection iyo use oo information as described Privacy Policy.

ProjectsPage.title: Mashaariicda
ProjectsPage.roleAstro: CEO ka dib helitaanka, kaas oo ah sidoo kale angel pre-seed
ProjectsPage.walletyDescription: Websayto falanqeysi ah [Polkadot](https://polkadot.com) & [Kusama](https://kusama.network/) ecosystem, kaasoo caasimad u ahaa inay muujiso isticmaalayaasha falanqeysni macquul ah oo ku saabsan wallet-yadeeda sida katseynta, isticmaalka bilowga, CSV-ga loo soo saaro iyo lacag lagu bixiyay bayada shabakadda. Waxaan soo raxaashay 2 jecel laga mid ah [Kusama DAO](https://dune.com/substrate/kusama-gov), oo markii dambe ay dib loo celinay maadaama ay joogday inaan ku biiro [Community Labs](https://www.communitylabs.com/).
ProjectsPage.othentDescription: Mission [Othent](https://othent.io) ay ahayd enable normal everyday online consumers to access blockchain projects, without use complex cryptographic private keys iyo instead use any Oauth account access sida Google. Waxaan founded project as 1st outside Fellow incubated within [Community Labs](https://www.communitylabs.com), software development company founded [Tate Berenbaum](https://x.com/TateBerenbaum) in [Arweave](https://arweave.org) ecosystem. [Othent](https://othent.io) ay then acquired [Wander](https://wander.app) into their core product, [Arweave](https://arweave.org) & [AO](https://ao.arweave.net) ecosystem Web3 wallet ay over 50,000 users, becoming [Wander Connect](https://www.wander.app/connect).
ProjectsPage.liquidOpsDescription: Protokol lagu bixiyo oo lagu borrow-o ku sabanaya [AO](https://ao.arweave.net), kaasoo caasimad u ahaa inay furato $400m oo dhaaf ah oo qiime ah [Arweave](https://arweave.org) tokens. Waxaan la aasaasay mashruuca [Marton Lederer](https://x.com/martonlederer), waxaan noqday kampani koowaad ee Fellowship-ka ay soo celiyeen ee laga tuuray [Community Labs](https://www.communitylabs.com), waxaan jiidisay kumanaan [waitlist](https://x.com/Liquid_Ops/status/1863863983498805473?s=20) signup oo kordhay $55m soft-commits kaasoo leh on-chain fund verification, [pitch-ay la yidhi](https://x.com/aoTheVentures/status/1813676139795374171?s=20) [AO Ventures](https://www.aoventures.io) demo day oo markaas waxaan soo raxaashay [$325k pre-seed round](https://www.ibtimes.co.uk/revolutionizing-defi-how-lorimer-jenkins-marton-lederer-are-transforming-arweave-liquidops-1729945). Waxaan sii daynay mainnet, waxaan lenahay mid yar oo isku-xir oo ay ka mid yihiin AO Chrome/IOS/Andriod wallet-yada [Wander](https://wander.app) ([demo halkan](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4ODxijaC0Dc)) & [Beacon](https://getbeaconapp.com) ([demo halkan](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GeQ01-rBUPQ&t=11s)). Waxaan sidoo kale wuu dhamaaday oo way mandhal-gashay audit-yada ay sameeyeen shirkadda [Spearbit](https://cantina.xyz/solutions/spearbit) & [Quantstamp](https://quantstamp.com/).
ProjectsPage.contentCreationDescription: Waxaan sameeyaa video content oo ku jira dhammaan platforms weyn ee social media. Waxaan ujeedadeystay in taasi noqoto hab fiican oo ah in noo dhiso kooxda onlineka, aad caalimka tuso waxa aan sameeyo oo ay la kulmo dad cusub meelaha cusub. Waxaan sidoo kale bilabay podcast la yaqaan [Lorimer's Podcast](/#podcast).
ProjectsPage.cryptoTeenDescription: [Crypto Teen](https://www.tiktok.com/@lorimer__jenkins) ay cryptocurrency TikTok channel aiming ahaan educate Gen Z on what crypto ay, covering basic concepts iyo know-how ee Web3 blockchain space.
ProjectsPage.subsidisejsDescription: Subsidise JS ay package built ahaan enable [Arweave 4096-bit RSA-PSS JWK's](https://medium.com/@perma_dao/wallet-and-did-in-the-arweave-ecosystem-5714877fe745) to bundle transactions together iyo pay gas fees para kale users transactions via [ANS-102](https://github.com/ArweaveTeam/arweave-standards/blob/master/ans/ANS-102.md) Arweave network standard. Waxaan plan ahaan integrate into kale projects ay raba ahaan cover users gas upload fees, ay enable users ahaan not ay pay AR tokens ahaan use Web 2 consumer app built Arweave.
ProjectsPage.astroDescription: Astro ay liquidity solution built para seamless integration within Web3 ecosystems. By aggregating multiple stablecoins iyo fiat currencies into single, unified asset - USDA, Astro ay ensure frictionless value exchange between real-world iyo on-chain applications.
ProjectsPage.coolarweaveaddressDescription: Repo ay allow aad ahaan generate lots [Arweave 4096-bit RSA-PSS JWK's](https://medium.com/@perma_dao/wallet-and-did-in-the-arweave-ecosystem-5714877fe745) to find cool iyo unique wallet addresses. Claude ay automatically detect cool addresses based desired parameters-kaaga.
ProjectsPage.aothecomputerDescription: Saaxiib baa ii sheekeyay sheeko oo ku saabsan kartida helitaanka domain-ka aad la barbar-dhig jiray qiimo yar oo aad kurang, waxaan la mahadsantahay (iyo xubinta ka caasisan) mana jiidhisbaday ka fikiritaanka cashuurta wanaag ee uu helay. Sidaa darteed waxaan bilaabay raadinta Namecheap si haddii ay jiraan cashuuraha kale ee wanaag oo la kaadiyay. Waxaa soo baxay [AO The Computer .com](https://aothecomputer.com) oo lagu iibsan lahaa $11.48 sanah, qabso taas [redacted] üòú.
ProjectsPage.aohtmlDescription: AO HTML waa qalab kaasoo kugu oggolaanaya inaaad abuurta bog qaab-dhismeed ah iyada oo HTML-file lagu isticmaalo kaasoo iska-cusbooneysi karta lagu saleysan waxaa laga soo qaatay AO network-ka iyada oo ah process. Tusaale ah bogag decentralised kaasoo waxaa lagu geyn-geyninayo content iyada oo lagu isticmaalo decentralised provider sida DAO, tusaale ahaan boggu wuu ku iska-cusbooneysi lahaa mar ay DAO proposal-ku dhaafin karo iyo Web2 front end-yada oo dhan oo ku yaal Vercel/Netlify waxay sidoo kale iska-cusbooneysi doonaan iyada oo isticmaalen script-kan.

WritingPage.title: Qoraalka
WritingPage.substackSignup: Sign up ahaan receive new blog posts by email.

BookshelfPage.title: Shelka buugga
BookshelfPage.subtitle: Buugga ay help shape thinking-kaygaa
BookshelfPage.richDadPoorDadNotes: Great introduction ahaan financial literacy iyo importance assets over liabilities.
BookshelfPage.1984Notes: Chilling iyo prophetic dystopian novel ay remain terrifyingly relevant hadda.
BookshelfPage.zeroToOneNotes: Ay provide guide para entrepreneurs on how ahaan build monopolies iyo create value by questioning conventional wisdom to find new opportunities, challenge competition, iyo build valuable companies.
BookshelfPage.hardThingNotes: Brutally honest advice on building iyo running startup. No sugarcoating, just real experiences.
BookshelfPage.whatYouDoNotes: Fascinating exploration oo company culture through historical examples oo Toussaint Louverture to Genghis Khan.
BookshelfPage.spareNotes: Candid look into royal life iyo pressures oo growing up ee public eye as royal.
BookshelfPage.riseAndFallNotes: Biography ay chronicles lives Prince Andrew iyo Sarah Ferguson, oo marriage ilaa hadda.

Feed.sectionSubtitle: Eeg qalabka ugu dambeeyay ee YouTube iyo X

News.sectionSubtitle: Muuqaalada lagu magacaabay iyo muuqaalada media
News.news1Title: Devs Partnership si loo Sameeyo Protocols Borrowing ee Koowaad ee Arweave Lagu Sameeyo AO
News.news2Title: Wareynta DeFi: Sidee Lorimer Jenkins Iyo Marton Lederer Ay Bedelayaan Arweave Isagoo Adeegsanaya LiquidOps
News.news3Title: Furidda mustaqbalka maliyada decentralized: Socdaalka Lorimer Jenkins ee lagu sameeyo DeFi iyo Web3
News.news4Title: Liquid Labs Waxaa La Iibiyay Astro Si Loo Balaadhiso Arweave DeFi

About.description: Waxaan ahay uur-qabanaha ka yimid England oo hadda safarka ku ah US/UK/EU ku AirBnb's. Waxaan xiisaysan yahay crypto, startups iyo horumarinta software. Waxaan kaarbeegay venture capital iyo acting. Waxaan sidoo kale ahay content creator oo aan haysto podcast la yidhaahdo [Lorimer's Podcast](/#podcast).

Podcast.title: Lorimer's Podcast
Podcast.description: Iska raaca hadalkii qoto dheer oo lala hadlayo asaasiyeyaasha, mamuusyada, iyo dhisayaasha ku jira kaabka startup-ka. Waxaan baaritaan karbaashka ku jira mashruuca, caqa bartay, iyo mustaqbalka teknolojiyada kala duwan.

SubstackSignup.title: Ogaada hadda
SubstackSignup.description: Ku biir warqaddayda lagu dhaafiyaa maqalada blog ee cusub si toos ah oo waxkasta ugu yimid. Waxaan qoraa ku saabsan ganacsiiyada cusub, crypto, isagga dhisista jidh shaaha iyo waxyaalaha waxbarasho ee laga bartay socdaalka aan ahaan jiray oo founderkiina.

FAQ.title: Su'aalaha Inta Badan La Weydiiyo
FAQ.a1: Waxaan ahay founder ku dhisaya LiquidOps, protocol lagu iibiyaa oo lagu renta oo ku saabsan AO. Sidoo kale waxaan maalgelin angel ah ku qabaa startup-yada bilowga ah, waxaan kaas weyn nooqda qaybta adag, crypto, iyo dhisitaan dadban.
FAQ.q2: Ma ku heshay xiddigid ama shaqada leh go'aan?
FAQ.a2: Maan sameyn shaqada leh go'aan, sida aan u rumaysto in leh go'aan ay mararka qaarkood diidaan. Waxaan doonayo in maalgelin angel ah ku qabaa founders ay jira inaan kaas kale dhisa.
FAQ.q3: Sidee baan kuu magacaaban karaa maalgelin?
FAQ.a3: I email ka dir [heylorimerjenkins@gmail.com](mailto:heylorimerjenkins@gmail.com) oo lagu yidhaahdo pitch deck-kaaga. Caadiga ah waxaan maalgelin $500-$5,000 ku qabaa rounds pre-seed ah oo lagu dhisayo meelaha ay kaas experience ah.
FAQ.q4: Maxaa technology ah oo aad u shaqaysaa?
FAQ.a4: Waxaan si caadi ah u shaqaysaa TypeScript, React, Next.js, iyo blockchain technology-yada oo ay ka mid yihiin Arweave iyo AO. Waxaan ahay full-stack developer oo naftaydii baray.
FAQ.q5: Ma jiri karaa guest ku sida podcast-kaaga?
FAQ.a5: Waxaan had iyo jeer raadiya in la hadlo founders, investors, iyo builders oo la caadi ah. Soo dir email-ka [heylorimerjenkins@gmail.com](mailto:heylorimerjenkins@gmail.com) oo lagu yidhaahdo xaasida oo lala hadlaya waxaad doonaysaan inaan la hadlo.

FilmsPage.title: Filimada & TV
FilmsPage.subtitle: Qoraalka diariyada kceliyadda filimada & TV-ga
FilmsPage.marginCallDescription: Filim gumeysan oo aad u wata oo lagu soo agabajiyay 24 saac oo ah bankiga mamuulka Wall Street oo ku taagan gacanta kraysiska dareenka 2008.
FilmsPage.theBigShortDescription: Sheekeynta dhallaanka iyo wararka dareenka 2008 ee suuqa guryaha oo ay jire dadka qeexay iyo ku tuulideen lacag.
FilmsPage.theWolfOfWallStreetDescription: Sheekeynta qalloocan ee Jordan Belfort, deriska shareega kaas oo lagu ceebiyay lacag milyoonada ah isagoo nolosha hadii yar wada qaatay.
FilmsPage.billionsDescription: Darama xoog leh oo ku saabsan maareeyaha hedge fund oo jeer-jeeraan katirsan sharciga magalada America.
FilmsPage.goldDescription: Lagu salaynay waxyaabaha dhab ah, oo buugaag iyo geoologist ah ayaa isbarbar joga iyo dhaadheer goobta dhahaarka ah ee magaalada Indonesia, taas oo keentay hadbaabka miyniga.
FilmsPage.warDogsDescription: Labada gabar oo yar ayaa isticmaali qorsheynta dawladda si ay u noqdaan ganacsteyaasha hubka caalamiga ah, taas oo lagu salaynay sheekeysi baaqbaq.
FilmsPage.uncutGemsDescription: Jeweler-ka caasimad caalmigu ah ee New York-ka ee Diamond District-ka ayaa sameynayaa hadhoow oo ay kuu dareensan karto si ay u maareerto calaacali tirada ah.
FilmsPage.catchMeIfYouCanDescription: Sheekeynta dhab ah ee Frank Abagnale Jr., con artist-ka iska leh kaas oo si noocan ah u dhegaysatay pilot, doctor, iyo lawyer ‚Äî dhan intii ay jirin 19 jir.
FilmsPage.wecrashedDescription: Soo kacidda iyo dhacidda WeWork iyo ninka hoggaaminayaasha caasimad leh laakiin hadal-hadal ah ee Adam Neumann.
FilmsPage.djangoUnchainedDescription: Aqali-laxawga jira ayaa wada shaqeyn geedi-socodka bounty hunter ah ee German si ay u badbaad gabar ka miiska plantaation-ka Mississippi ee xoog leh.
FilmsPage.pulpFictionDescription: Sheekooyin oo isbarbar-jira dembi iyo baab-bixin Angles city ee Los Angeles, lagu sheekaysan yihiin qaab tarantino ah oo aan xeer-haysan.
FilmsPage.inglouriousBasterdsDescription: Koox askari-American-ka ee Jew ah ayaa qorsheynaysa hadalkii hoggaamiye-Nazi ah ee lagu carbaashay Faransa intii World War II.
FilmsPage.kidulthoodDescription: Muuqaal barbar-firfircan iyo joogteyn 48 saac ee ogada caruurta yar ee magaalada West London.
FilmsPage.adulthoodDescription: Lix sannadood ka dib waxyaabaha Kidulthood-ka, Sam waa laga sii daayay xabsiga iyo waa inuu maqlishii qaladihiisa.
FilmsPage.brotherhoodDescription: Qaybta dhamaadka ee trilogy-ka ayaa Samuug agy ku tushaaray qaladihiisa intii ay hadal weydhar hadalkii iska noqdaan.
FilmsPage.riseOfTheFootsoldierDescription: Sheekeynta dhab ah oo cabsi ah ee football hooligan oo noqday gangster-ka ee magaalada Essex intii xilli 1980s iyo 90s.
FilmsPage.topBoySummerhouseDescription: Series-ka asalka ah ee Channel 4 oo raacaya ganacsteyaasha daruusha ay iskula fogaada magaalada Hackney, East London.
FilmsPage.topBoyDescription: Netflix-ka oo dib-marinayn ayaa wada-jira sheekeynta Dushane iyo Sully isagoo ay doonayaan in ay dib u qabsadaan position-kooda ee ganacsta daruusha London.
FilmsPage.peakyBlindersDescription: Gaashaanka gangster-ka family oo lagu taxab 1920s Birmingham, raacaya soo kacidda family-ka Shelby crime.
FilmsPage.snatchDescription: Shabakada kala-duwan ee London gangsters, dodgy boxing promoters, iyo dhagax-buurta nacnac oo isbarbar-jira sheekeyni cabsi oo shariya.
FilmsPage.lockStockAndTwoSmokingBarrelsDescription: Afar-habar East End ayaa lagu tuuray shabakada dembi marka oyun karti oo la-xaruufay ay iska geeyana nuqul nus milyoon pound.
FilmsPage.breakingBadDescription: Barista-ka kemistriyada ee dugsiga sare oo noqday ganacstaan methamphetamine marka lagu carbaashay caabuga-dhima ah.
FilmsPage.betterCallSaulDescription: Hortidda Breaking Bad ayaa raacaya Jimmy McGill oo jabrra yar oo noqday Saul Goodman-ka xor-dhiibnimo.
FilmsPage.elCaminoABreakingBadMovieDescription: Marka waxyaabaha Breaking Bad-ka dhaco, Jesse Pinkman ayaa iska carjiga xabsiga iyo waa inuu qeexo qaladihiisa si uu u dhaarto mustaqbal cusub.
FilmsPage.interstellarDescription: Koox ogada-socodka ayaa safarka lagu qabta mid-calaaq ah si ay u raadiyaan planet-ka nolol cusub ees adduunka ay ku soo jeda khatar.
FilmsPage.parasiteDescription: Familia-ba ayaa qorsheynaysa inay soo galo guriga tajir-ka, iyadoo leh waxyaabaha baab-bixin iyo qurac cabsi.
FilmsPage.blackMirrorDescription: Series anthology-ka dystopian oo shekaysaya waxyaabaha-madow ee teknolojiyada iyo wax-weydaarta uu leeyahay nolosha hadda-hadda.
FilmsPage.oblivionDescription: Adduunka ka dib-socodka apocalypse, drone repairman-ka ayaa ogaadaya safar-gur oo leh waxyaaba tilmaami waxyaan uu rumaysanayo.
FilmsPage.exMachinaDescription: Programmer-ka yar ayaa lagu dooray si ay u qaybqaato imtixaan-ka tilmaama-sahriigu ee AI-ka sare.
FilmsPage.iAmMotherDescription: Gabar-waaqi oo lagu koray gabar-cybernetic ah ee xabiga hoose ayaa bilaabaya inay su'aasho noloshay marka mid-straar ay yimaaddo.
FilmsPage.snowpiercerDescription: Adduunka jilid-ka dib-socodka apocalypse, noloshayaasha-na ayaa degano tren oo har-har socota oo loo kala-go'ay fasalka.
FilmsPage.getOutDescription: Qof-dubman oo gabar-cad ayaa booqan reeerka reer-cad oo magaalada lasoo-baxay, halkaas oo waxyaabaha khatar-muun oo baaqbaq-weyn oo astumaamo muuqda.
FilmsPage.prisonersDescription: Marka ay maqan noqdaan labada gabar-yar, aabba caasibaya ayaa awooda-qabsiga hantii qof-radadka ayaa raada feydha kasta.
FilmsPage.birdBoxDescription: Haween iyo caruurteeda ayaa safarka lagu qabta mid-magaalo oo dhulkoodka ah si ay u carjiga waxyaabaha muuqda oo qofka waydaarta ay ku diriraan.
FilmsPage.thePlatformDescription: Xabsi-midig-midig oo cajiib lagu sii jidiinayo-kow jidiinaya midig midig, maxaabiista ayaa ay iskula dagaan gaajo iyo mid-kale.
FilmsPage.thePlatform2Description: Koox cusub oo maxaabiista ah ayaa ah-baha xabsi-midig-midig cusub, iyada oo waxba lama-midab lagu sii jidiinayo-kow jidiinaya.
FilmsPage.glassOnionAKnivesOutMysteryDescription: Detective Benoit Blanc ayaa iska socdaa magaalada billionaire-ka tech-ka oo ku mid-yaal isla-isla si ay u duliso-duliso astumaamo cusub oo dhexdhexaad ah.
FilmsPage.dontLookUpDescription: Labada astronomer ayaa iska qabqabta comet-ka u soocda adduunka laakiin ay ku adkaadaan in alaab-celis oo caajis ay rumeysato.
FilmsPage.thePerksOfBeingAWallflowerDescription: Dugsiga yar-yar oo qaar-qaaca-fallaag ayaa lagu kaco jirka adolescence-ka taallada labada senior-ka ah oo shaac-shaaca.
FilmsPage.titanicDescription: Labada iyo toban jir oo aristocrat-ka ayaa ay-jeclaan artist-ka oo xor-dhiibnimo ah oo safara dhabarka R.M.S. Titanic.
FilmsPage.thePursuitOfHappynessDescription: Sheekeynta baaqbaq iyo rajo ee Chris Gardner, saytuun-oo-hadhoow ah oo noqday gurigu-dib-u-dhacay isagoo koray ilmo-yar iyo raaqo-ganacstada shareega.
FilmsPage.theBoyInTheStripedPyjamasDescription: Gabar-xasaasi ee iska dhexmarta ilmo-Nazi-ka commandant-ka iyo ilmo-Jew-ka oo xabsi-galay ee galgal xasuuq.
FilmsPage.jokerDescription: Caje-daaf-daal-ka oo kaamile-daal ayaa soo jira kuthibir madaxwaynaya Gotham City-ka inka ay la-tiri ‚Äî Joker-ka.
FilmsPage.theIrishmanDescription: Hal-kudhis-baroor ayaa u-fikiraysaa noloshiisa dembi ah, isku-tallaarka sharci-sarriciska family-ka Bufalino, iyo maqan-tir-ka Jimmy Hoffa.
FilmsPage.forrestGumpDescription: Qof-naxariis-leh oo ay-fikirta yar ayaa si aan-la-iska-indatin u wax-qabao dhawr-dhawr waxyaabaha-tarikh ee 20-aad-cimidda century America.
FilmsPage.theQueensGambitDescription: Chess-ka prodigy-ka uu dhadka ah ayaa ay-laddin iyo rajo kula-dagaya rankings-ka sharci-sarricu chess-ka intii Hararka Kulul.
FilmsPage.babyReindeerDescription: Caje-daaf-daal-ka hadal-jilbaynta ayaa soo jira bila ay radarsanayo marka ay iska-raadiso gabar-mid ee bar-koodii ay noqdo baaqbaq-caddaad.
FilmsPage.dexterDescription: Blood spatter-ka analyst-ka Miami-ka police-ka ayaa adag-cad jira noloshiisa-dual oo qof-dilka-dhuun ah oo dilo-dillaacay qof-dilka kale.
FilmsPage.tigerKingDescription: Sheekeynta baaqbaq iyo qurac ee Joe Exotic, guri-bahoobadi oo lagu ceebiye waxyaabaha-dilka iyo bahoobada-qare-qare.
FilmsPage.jimmySavileABritishHorrorStoryDescriptio: Dukumentari-ka caasibaya oo tilmaama sida Jimmy Savile uu qarsoonayay toban sannadood oo dembi-dhuun isagoo daba-dhigay celebrity iyo ganacsta charity-ka.
FilmsPage.hitlerTheRiseOfEvilDescription: Labada-qaybood dramatise-ka ee noloshiisa-durar ee Adolf Hitler iyo soo kacidda-muuqda oo lagu soo-baxay artist-ka oo iska noqday dictator-ka Germany.
FilmsPage.squidGameDescription: Boqol-boqol iyo toban-habar oo lacag-istaag ah ayaa ay-qaatay gacan dhawaaq si ay ushubaan-sheekeyni caruurta-yar ay ciyaaraan premium-da ‚Äî iyada oo waxa ay keento nolol-waalan.
FilmsPage.theExpendablesDescription: Koox-ogada mudan ee mercenaries-ka ayaa lagu diriya ay-jeexio dictator-ka cruel-ka latin-Amerika.
FilmsPage.theExpendables2Description: Mercenaries-ka wada ay isbarbar-socdaan ganacsta yar oo ay-dhal, halkaas oo baaqbaq-soocda baaqbaq-soocda.
FilmsPage.theExpendables3Description: Barney Ross ayaa ay-kabida koox-cusub oo mercenaries-ka yar si ay-jeexio co-founder-ka duruuso-badalka gunnada.
FilmsPage.avengersEndgameDescription: Avengers-ka ayaa ay-isbarbar-iska-qabaan wada-jir dhamaadka si ay-cayyin Thanos oo-feynka iyo ay-cel galaxy-ka.
FilmsPage.angelHasFallenDescription: Secret Service-ka agent Mike Banning ayaa la-ceebiye diluuca-kasta Madaxweyne-ka iyo waa inuu-celiye magac-koodii.
FilmsPage.londonHasFallenDescription: Hoggaamiye-world-ka ayaa ay-raadiyaan gaashaanta Prime Minister-ka British-ka burial-ka, iyo Mike Banning waa inuu-badbaadu President-ka US-ka intii London ay-ceecee.
FilmsPage.jurassicWorldDescription: Park-baahay-dinaasaur-ka oo awood-buuxo ayaa ay-soo-jida jakhaadir markaa dinaasaur-hybrid oo lagu-marka-qabay ayaa carjiga.
FilmsPage.jurassicWorldFallenKingdomDescription: Ganacsta badbaad-sa dinaasaur-ka oo gidaar-guduud ay-keenayo waxyaabaha qorsheysataw-hadalka-gaar oo lagu-marka-qabay.
FilmsPage.homefrontDescription: Iska-kayd-hore ee DEA-ka agent ayaa ay-muuda magaalada-yar si ay-noloshaan nolosh-qabo laakiin ay-riyaada arday uu-jira methi-work.
FilmsPage.spenserConfidentialDescription: Iska-kayd-hore ee cop-ka ayaa ay-noqdo xabsi si ay-ogaado in labada-guud ee cop-kii hore ay-lagu-galisay, ay-soo-gelinaysaa Boston-ka underworld-ka dembi.
FilmsPage.centralIntelligenceDescription: Accountant-ka ay-fikirta-yar ayaa ay-gelinayo mission CIA-ka xoog-leh oo ay-diine koob-hore classmate-ka ah uu-noqday agent-rogue.
FilmsPage.vikingsDescription: Qoof Norse-ka oo caan ah Ragnar Lothbrok ayaa soo-kaca fermis oo noqday warrior iyo boqor-caasibaya, hoggaamina raiis-gelidda England iyo wax-kale.
FilmsPage.aboutABoyDescription: London-ka wealthy iyo ay-fikirta-yar ayaa maqlish uu-leeyahay ilmo si ay-aragto haween-hal-kudhis-baroor, markaa ay-qabqaba ay-dhaaf ilmo bahoobad.
FilmsPage.peepShowDescription: Noloshiisa ay-caasibaya labada flatmates-ka oo ay-waxyaabaha ay-sababan, laygu-sheekaysan ictihaaf-danbe-fiker-adag.
FilmsPage.theInbetweenersDescription: Afar-habar adolescent-ka ay-fikirta-gaab ayaa ay-lagu-tegeen waxyaabaha-caasibaya sixth form-ka, gabar-yar, iyo-waxyaabahoodii ay-aag-aag.
FilmsPage.afterLifeDescription: Qof uu-duufa ay-ku-fikiray nolosh-dayactir laakiin markaas ay-goddo ay-adkaysato adduunka oo ay-sheegato waxyaabaho xoriyeed.
FilmsPage.derekDescription: Qof-naxariis-leh ayaa shaqo-jira guri-bahoobada yar-yar, muuqaal ay-caddaayaan reesidenta iyo staff-ka.
FilmsPage.theOfficeDescription: Crew-ka dukumentari ayaa ay-qabqaba noloshiisa-ay-caasibaya iyo ay-adag-jilbayaanta qof-shaqada ee kumpanya-waraqidi Slough.
FilmsPage.badEducationDescription: Barista-ka qasac-buuxa iyo ay-kaami-daaf ee dugsiga hayaan-daad ee Watford ayaa ay-keenaysa caasibaya klaska ay-diine iyo staff-ka.
FilmsPage.orangeIsTheNewBlackDescription: New Yorker-ka ay-tajir ayaa nolosh-kidda ay-jilbaynta marka lagu-xukumay xabsi-naag-gaab sannadood toban markii ay-lagu-sheegato dembi ay-dhawr sannadood jiro.
FilmsPage.brooklynNinenineDescription: Detective-ka ay-tilmaan laakiin ay-fikirta-yar iyo walaalkiis ay-kala-duwan ayaa ay-qabataan dembi ee Brooklyn-ka 99-dik precinct ay-boqor-cusub-caasibaya.
FilmsPage.sexEducationDescription: Gabar-dugsiga ay-fikirta-caasib oo haween-therapist-ka ay mama ayaa ay-sameysatay clinic-ka therapy-sex ee dugsi-yar.
FilmsPage.thisCountryDescription: Mockumentary ayaa raacaya labada asxaab ay-iskalaag dhawr baadalaag baadalaag iyo bahoobada magaalada-baadhe ee Cotswolds-ka.
FilmsPage.motherlandDescription: Sharp comedy-ka oo saabsan adduun-caasib iyo ay-diiga-jira ee parenting-ta middle-class ee isbaarto-ka dugsi-ka.
FilmsPage.fridayNightDinnerDescription: Labada walaalkood ayaa buuq-gur ay-aabba iyo gabar kasta Friday maalinta galaay, halkaas oo caasibaya iyo ay-joojinta ay-jira.
FilmsPage.benidormDescription: Koox British ay-baahay ayaa ay-nimcada Solana all-inclusive resort-ka Benidorm-ka, Spain-ka, qaxwo, sangria, iyo waxyaabaha-baahay.
FilmsPage.hatersBackOffDescription: Gabar-bahoobad oo ay-aad u-rumeysan ayaa ay-rumaysanaysa ay-qaddarka internet fame-ka, ay-waydaysata reerta iyo deriska.
FilmsPage.theJobLotDescription: Ay-caasibaya kasta-maalinta ee staff iyo ay-booqda West Midlands job centre-ka.
FilmsPage.gavinStaceyDescription: Sheekeysi jacayl-fagaare oo waajin iska-adkaysata ay-caruur ay-tagay ay-socdoonta-kale-iska-duwan pileeco-dhexdhexaad.
FilmsPage.outnumberedDescription: Middle-class London-ka ay-gobiye ay-isbaarta ayaa ay-lagu-hadlin caruurta-saddex ay-waydaysata oo lagu-ceecee-jirto caasibaya.
FilmsPage.freshMeatDescription: Lix-habar oo-kala-duwan ee dugsiga ayaa ay-degaan guriga Manchester-ka, ay-lagu-tegeen raaxo-caruurista iyo baab-bixinta nolosh-dugsiga.
FilmsPage.theEndOfTheFingWorldDescription: Qof ay-rumeysan-jira uu-dhallaanki psychology iyo gabar-maca-cad ayaa ay-safarka lagu-qabta oo ay-caajib-caajib ee magaalada-baadhe England-ka.
FilmsPage.unbreakableKimmySchmidtDescription: Gabar ayaa iska-badbaad-da cult-doomsday iyo ay-sameysatay nolosh cusub New York City-ka oo lagu-jilbaynayo ay-rajo iyo nolosh-ogaab yar.
FilmsPage.citizenKhanDescription: Qof-madaxweyne-leeyahay uu-diriye reerca Pakistani Birmingham-ka ayaa ay-lagu-tegeen nolosh-qalbiga iyo siyaasa-deegga oo ay-boqor-caasibaya.
FilmsPage.stepBrothersDescription: Labada wiil ay-caasib-layaag oo ay-santis-midig oo ay-noqdaan stepsibyo markii ay-qoysaska ay-guuraan, ay-keenaysaa warwarsame-dhamaadka domi.
FilmsPage.daddysHomeDescription: Stefather-ka ay-naxariis-leh nolosh ayaa ay-jilbaynta markii caruurta-payadii ay-biyo aabba-asal oo ay-bay-jooga ay-yimaad.
FilmsPage.daddysHome2Description: Labada aabba ayaa ay-lagu-tegeen aabbayahooda deegga libaax, halkaas oo noosh-liqo-qof Christmas ay-keentay waxyaabaha-diiga.
FilmsPage.21JumpStreetDescription: Labada rookie cops ayaa ay-sirtaa dugsiga-sare caruurta ay-dilo ganacsta-daruusha, markaa ay-bilicaa fashash-taariikha ayaa ay-beddelay.
FilmsPage.22JumpStreetDescription: Labada cops-sirtaa oo ay-waydiinaysaa dhammaan ay-sheekaysataw barbaarin kolleejga, oo lagu-markaysoo-jokes muuqda sequel-ka.
FilmsPage.murderMysteryDescription: New York-ka cop iyo gabar ayaa ay-safara ay-baahaysataw-barbaarin markii ay-tuuraan premium-da billionaire-ka.
FilmsPage.murderMystery2Description: Labada qof ee sheekeysi-kowaad ay-ay lagu-dhaca boqol-boqol ee kale international dembi markii ay-safar-xan-ka wedding-da.
FilmsPage.theWrongMissyDescription: Qof ayaa si habsiyaad uu-tiisiyo gabar-kale oo corporate retreat-ka, iyo ay-ay-ay-aad u-qurac.
FilmsPage.thatsMyBoyDescription: Qof uu-ilmo-dhalay ay-barista-koodii markii ay-ninka yar ayaa ay-la-socdaa ilmo-koodii oo ay-hadda-hadda-tagay-buuxdo intii ay-guursan.
FilmsPage.grownUpsDescription: Shan-habar ay-caruurta ay-ku-degaan socdaanta July koob-ta markii ay-ogaadeen aabbahooda basketball-ka ay-dhintay.
FilmsPage.grownUps2Description: Labada qof-isku-xidig ee ay-socdoonta ay-la-tegeen caruurta-caasibaya, walaalkood-cusub, iyo 80s-theme-ka galadka.
FilmsPage.anchormanTheLegendOfRonBurgundyDescripti: 1970s San Diego-ka news anchor-ka ay-fikirta-xun ayaa ay-jilbaynta markii ay-barista-ambition-leh-naag ay-noqoto teamka.
FilmsPage.anchorman2TheLegendContinuesDescription: Ron Burgundy iyo team-ka news-ka ayaa ay-lagu-diriya ay-habaarin 24-saac network-ka 1980s New York-ka.
FilmsPage.getHardDescription: Wealthy finance exec oo la-xukumay-buuxa ayaa ay-kiraya car wash owner si ay-u-diyaariyso nolosh-xabsi, ay-rumaysanayo ay-jira xabsi.
FilmsPage.identityThiefDescription: Businessman ayaa ay-raadsataw gabar-kale oo ay-xaasilo-qabsatay, ay-keenaysaa safarka caasib-badan ee Florida illaa Denver.
FilmsPage.dodgeballATrueUnderdogStoryDescription: Koox-bahoobad ayaa ay-gala tournament-ka dodgeball si ay-badbaad-guri-giid ay-ay-isku-tuurta corporation-warta.
FilmsPage.norbitDescription: Qof-naxariis-leh nolosh ayaa ay-soo-jida rajo gabar-yar ee asal markii ay-gabar ay-lagu-ce-dhistay oo ay-adag-buux-leh.
FilmsPage.hereComesTheBoomDescription: Biology-ka barista ayaa ay-ka-qaata MMA-ka lixaad si ay-saamaysato lacag iyo ay-badbaadu dugsiga-barnamijada ay-shiid.
FilmsPage.chefDescription: Chef-ka oo ay-waydaystay dukaanka-koodii ayaa ay-habaarin food truck-ka oo ilmo-koodii, ay-ogaadsataw rajo-miiska-koodii adduun-aguu.
FilmsPage.theInternshipDescription: Labada qof ay-santis-midig oo saytuun-ah ayaa ay-sheegaysataw si ay-galo Google internships-ka, ay-iskula-jira college-caruurta-tilmaan.
FilmsPage.dirtyGrandpaDescription: Lawyer-ka ay-caasib-jaama ayaa la-ceebiye si ay-socdoonta aabba-koodii oo ay-hadal-xun-leh Florida-ka markii barbaarin.
FilmsPage.paulBlartMallCopDescription: Mall security guard-ka ay-midig iyo ay-naxariis-leh ayaa waa inuu-badbaadu marka ganacsta-crimi ay-tuura-kara shopping centre-koodii.
FilmsPage.paulBlartMallCop2Description: Paul Blart ayaa ay-socdoonta Las Vegas-ka conference-ka security-ka, markaas ay-hadal-xun oo ay-qabqaba heist-ka hotel-casino-ka.
FilmsPage.bigHero6Description: Gabar-dugsiga robotics-ka iyo ay-gabar-hubaal ay-healthcare ayaa ay-socdaan koox-bahoobad ay-badbaad magaalada-koodii.
FilmsPage.kungFuPandaDescription: Panda-ga ay-caasib-baasaaso iyo caad-jecel ayaa ay-dooraysan Dragon Warrior iyo waa inuu-ardiyaato badbaad Valley-ka Peace-ka.
FilmsPage.kungFuPanda2Description: Po ayaa waa inuu-hadlishaa dhawr-waxyaabaha ay-jiiddo peacock-ka warlord-ka oo ay-dilo kung fu oo lagu-dhisay-xarbi-cusub.
FilmsPage.kungFuPanda3Description: Po ayaa ay-socdaan aabba-asaal ee magaalada-siir panda iyo waa inuu-ardiyaato ay-dilo villain-ka ay-quwwa-magical.
FilmsPage.theLegoMovieDescription: Minifigure-ka Lego-ta ay-caasib ayaa si habsiyaad loo-rumeysan ay-'Special' iyo ay-lagu-shaqeysataw quest-ka ay-dillaacay businessman-ca ay-boqor.
FilmsPage.beeMovieDescription: Bee-ka oo ay-dhammaystay college ayaa ay-goddo iyo lagu-raadsataw human-ka sharci-gale si ay-ay-lagu-ajaalliyaan bees intii ay-caday honey.
